articles.title: Will There Be an N.F.L. Season in 2020? - The New York Times
articles.description: Before the N.F.L. can begin the season as planned in September, it must first figure out how to safely open team facilities for training camps in mid-July.
articles.content:
Even as the coronavirus continued to ravage American communities, the N.F.L. last week released a full schedule of games that on the surface included no obvious backup plan in case the pandemic prevents the season from starting on Sept. 10.
But the odds that… [+14775 chars]
